But it’s also one that you can support from your couch. A large number of domestic wine producers and wine shops sell and ship bottles of responsibly made wines, so you can stock up on skin contact Riesling and Pinot Noir pét nat for the foreseeable future. Here’s a list of our favorite American winemakers and bottle shops that sell and ship their wine online:California Wine Producers:Ambythe Estate - Paso Robles, CAAmplify Wines - Santa Barbara, CABroc Cellars - Berkeley, CAClos Saron - Oregon House, CADirty & Rowdy Wines - Napa, CADonkey & Goat - Berkeley, CaJ Brix Wines - Escondido, CAKeep Wines - Napa, CALo-Fi Wines - Los Alamos, CAMadson Wines - Santa Cruz, CAMaître de Chai - Oakville, CAMartha Stoumen Wines - Sebastopol, CAMatthiasson Wines - Napa, CaMethod Sauvage - Etna, CAPax Mahle Wine - Sebastopol, CAPowicana Farm - Redwood Valley, CARaj Parr Wine - Santa Rita Hills, CARuth Lewandowski - Healdsburg, CAThe Scholium Project - Fairfield, CAStirm Wine Co. - Aromas, CASubject to Change Wines - Forestville, CAVinca Minor - Berkeley, CAOregon Wine Producers:Bow & Arrow Wines - Portland, ORBrooks Wine - Amity, ORCooper Mountain Vineyards - Willamette Valley, ORFranchere Wine Company - Willamette Valley, ORHiyu Wine Farm - Hood River, ORJohan Vineyards - Rickreall, ORTroon Vineyards - Applegate Valley, ORNew York Wine Producers:Channing Daughters Winery - Bridgehampton, NYHeart and Hands Wine Co. - Union Springs, NYLiten Buffel - Middleport, NYRavines Wine Cellar - Geneva, NYRed Tail Ridge Winery - Penn Yan, NYWine Producers Elsewhere:Iapetus Wine - Shelburne, VTLa Garagista - Bethel, VTOld Westminster Winery - Westminster, MDOyster River Winegrowers - Warren, MESouthold Farm + Cellar - Fredricksburg, TXWilliam Chris Vineyards - Hye, TXPhoto by Ted CAVANAUGHOnline Wine RetailersIf you’re looking for a variety or price point that can’t be found in the list of American producers above, support a shop that sells responsibly made wines from wineries around the world. Here are some of our favorite, but keep in mind that alcohol shipping laws vary from state to state.
